title: PAWS Welcome!, On-Site Laundry Facilities with New Washer & Dryers
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', '2 Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'The Avalon Apartments', '645 Wolff St, Denver, CO, 80204', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 22', 'OR Text', '22', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to The Avalon Apartments', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 400 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Avalon values residential comfort and convenience, which is why we have designed our apartments and community with an array of useful amenities.', 'Our West Colfax apartments in Denver come complete with spacious kitchens and chic appliance packages.', 'We also offer private laundry facilities, a pool, playground, grill station, picnic area, and a futsal court.', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'hoXhc1mY']
